P3212.ANFBackend.EntityClasses

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • P3212.ANFBackend.EntityClasses.Stats

  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Stats entity. Used to operate on users' statistic data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int deaths
      Number of fights during which user died Death occurs when a character died in battle against AI, but his team won

      Number of fights user took part in
      private int losses
      Number of fights user lost
      private int rating
      Rating of a user
      private int wins
      Number of fights user won
